ComicInfo.Summary:
The Doomsdale Scenario Part 1: On a forbidden frequency, Canada's King Charles III promises a plan to disrupt Volg activities.
Flesh Book 1 Part 13: When the spiders feed on sleeping Rangers, Carver locks Earl in with them. Revenge or safety?
Harlem Heroes Part 13: The match between the Harlem Heroes and the Flying Scotsman gets underway, and the Heroes are caught off guard.
Hollow World Part 2: As the The Mekon and Two of Verath implement their plans, Dan Dare meets Captain O'Grady and sends the Titan O.C. through a star jump.
Airship: The Morse X4 is boarded by The Black January Liberation Movement and John Probe must save the day.
Robot Wars, Part 4: Walter and Dredd infiltrate robot headquarters, only to be given away by Dredd's bleeding leg.
